channel.title: Tools on Momento
channel.description: Recent content in Tools on Momento

item.title: Git
item.description: Git can be useful when you build a version-control system to track changes in source code. Commit all modification and added files: git commit -am "informative message" To show all the history of a file: git log -p -- file To retrieve a specific version of a file: git show COMMIT:file Revert repo to a specific commit: git checkout COMMIT Undo a commit: git reset HEAD~ and then for the real commit git commit -c ORIG_HEAD.

item.title: Zotero
item.description: Zotero is a free, easy-to-use tool to help you collect, organize, cite, and share research. â€” Zotero Website How to sync PDFs across devices? Choose a cloud service provider that allows you to sync files across devices. Change settings in Zotero to acticate relatice paths for linked attachments. Go to Preferences -> Advanced -> Files and Folders, Change Data Directory Location from ‘Default’ to a custom Directory folder under your synced directory.
